articles.title: Largest strike in decades brings Germany to a standstill - Reuters.com
articles.description: Airports and bus and train stations across Germany were at a standstill on Monday, causing disruption for millions at the start of the working week during one of the largest walkouts in decades as Europe's biggest economy reels from inflation.
articles.content: BERLIN/FRANKFURT, March 27 (Reuters) - Airports and bus and train stations across Germany were at a standstill on Monday, causing disruption for millions at the start of the working week during one o… [+5313 chars]

articles.title: OnePlus and OPPO are apparently pulling out of Europe - XDA Developers
articles.description: Following the Find X6 series missing out on a launch outside China, it seems that things are only getting worse for Oppo.
articles.content: Oppo and OnePlus have been in a bit of a strange place for the last few months, particularly because of an ongoing dispute with Nokia. The company has had to pull both Oppo and OnePlus phones out of … [+1772 chars]

articles.title: European markets head for higher open as the region's banks are watched closely - CNBC
articles.description: European markets are heading for a higher open at the start of the new trading week, with the region's banks under scrutiny.
articles.content:
